subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Olli Jokinen and David Backes scored in the second period as the visiting St. Louis Blues topped the Chicago Blackhawks, 2-1, for their third straight win to move into first place in the Western Conference’s Central Division.
snippet: Olli Jokinen and David Backes scored in the second period as the visiting St. Louis Blues topped the Chicago Blackhawks, 2-1, for their third straight win to move into first place in the Western Conference’s Central Division.
